name: Rolling_Shutter_Flicker_Tear
description: 1kHz flicker creates diagonal tearing artifacts in CMOS rolling shutter sensors
expected_result: Diagonal banding and tearing in video. Corrupts forensic video evidence usability. Persists while flickering.
limitations: Only affects rolling shutter CMOS (most modern cameras). Global shutter cameras immune. Effect weakens >2m. Requires precise 1kHz frequency.
